mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: The rules of work and self-presentation have changed.

content.line1: Resumes, business cards, and static portfolios no longer represent who we are ‚Äî or who we're becoming.
content.line2: You're not just one title or one role. You're a creator, a freelancer, a collaborator, a job seeker ‚Äî and more.
content.whyContent: Because no existing tool lets people truly express and evolve their multi-dimensional professional selves in the AI era ‚Äî so we built one.
